resources.string: Pick a target number of reps for your exercise for today, DAY ONE.\n\nEach day you will have to do one more than the previous day. Keep POOSHing!

Milo of Croton (c. 6th-century BC) was alleged to have achieved his legendary strength by lifting a newborn calf and every day repeating the task until it was as large as a bull. Why? Because there wasn't a whole lot to do in the 6th-century.

Embrace his legend and Poosh yourself with progressive resistance training!

Milo reportedly died when he tried to tear a tree apart, became trapped, and was devoured by wolves.
Push-ups, sit-ups, crunches, pull-ups, whatever you want!
In the next window, select the number of reps you want to start with today. Each day you will have to do just one more.
Swipe the menu at the left to change your target or start over with a new workout.
Please use the navigation drawer at the left to choose a new target before logging your workouts.
Are you sure you want to clear all data and start over?
